SampleStudio
Home Sampler Preset Manager

Create. Sample. Perform.

A powerful web-based audio sampler with 16 velocity-sensitive pads, real-time waveform visualization, and cloud-synced presets.

Launch Sampler Manage Presets

Features

16 Velocity Pads

Responsive pads with velocity sensitivity. Use your keyboard or click to trigger samples.

Waveform Editor

Visualize and trim your samples with an interactive waveform display.

Quick Record

Record directly from your microphone and assign to any pad instantly.

Cloud Presets

Save and load presets from the cloud. Access your sounds anywhere.

Drag & Drop

Upload audio files by dragging them directly onto pads.

Keyboard Mapping

Play pads using your computer keyboard. Perfect for live performance.

Quick Start

1

Choose a Preset

Browse the preset library or create your own from scratch.

2

Load Sounds

Upload audio files, record from mic, or use preset sounds.

3

Start Playing

Click pads or use keyboard keys (1-4, Q-R, A-F, Z-V) to play!
